name: DARK SWORD (itch) (MrDoth)
description:
Dark Sword is a story about courage and love, open to the interpretation of the viewer. This version of the game is more than anything a playtest, since more features may come in the future, enjoy it!

  • W-A-S-D To move
  • W-A-S-D + SPACEBAR To roll
  • LEFT CLICK To use to Melee Attack
  • RIGHT CLICK To ranged attack
  • HIT ENEMY BULLETS WITH SWORD TO REFLECT
  • HIT ENEMIES WITH SWORD TO RELOAD THE GUN

Hello everyone, today I created a this game for some kind of gamejam, It is a game open to interpretation, an action game in which you will have to defeat large monsters that take refuge in these forbidden lands. I hope you like it and do not hesitate to leave me your impressions or suggestions since for the moment it is still under development c:
